name: Almas Aprisionadas
description:
This was made in 48 hours for the Inclusivity Game Jam by Backtrace. Unfortunately my computer was suffering with some issues so I couldn't finish it in time, it was supposed to have card game elements as a challenge.

Story

Meet Cher, a member of the Soul Hunter's family. One day during her hunting training she accidentally falls into a dark dungeon, now she must find it's exit by fixing doors while fighting ghost creatures with her only help: A soul deck of cards with "Almas Aprisionadas".

How to Play

Click to move Cher and interact with the scene.

The objective is to fix the doors in order to finish. Some doors need keys while other need special tools to be fixed.

Be aware, ghosts are sharing the place and can only defeat them by using your card deck of creatures.
